Text: So... how do you burn this to a CD/DVD?

If you want burn this to a CD - convert FLACs in any program you like to a 16/44.1 format. If you want to create DVD Audio - may it will be better if you download original DVD Audio ISO image, from which these tracks have been received.

tnx willrain for ul!  It seems the files came from the 2-channel tracks of an SACD.  The graphs, booklet and tracks can be organized onto a DVD.  It would be nice to have a rip of the DVD of this same title rather than the SACD.

Tracks was received from DVD Audio version of disc, you can find them at http://rutracker.org/forum/viewtopic.php?t=986408. As you see, image hosting, which has been used for covers upload is down. This covers from SACD that i had
Yes... I had looked at the SACD cover.  So I guess someone ripped the 5.1 audio from the DVD-A version and converted it to 2 channel FLAC's?  tnx again.
